name: Three Trapped Tigers- The Great Escape 2013
description: Three colour screen print (Black, Blue, Gold) 280 GSM Carin Eco card stock 450mm x 640mm Edition of 50 2013 "In the leaves of the gardens of this kind, a golden crown grows for those that merit it (...) Because the door is closed, no-one can enter the house unless he has the key, while God guides the star." -Hermetischer Philosophus oder Hauptschlüssel, Vienna, 1709 "Whoever wishes to enter the Philosophical Rose Garden without the key is like a man who wishes to walk without feet" -Michael Maier, Atalanta fugiens, Oppenheim, 1618

name: *Last available print in the edition*  Kyuss Lives! collaboration with Adam Pobiak
description:
Two copies of mine and Adam Pobiak's long sold out collaboration recently unearthed in a roll tube in some dark corner!

3 colour screen print (red/teal/red blend, gold, black)
300gsm Episode IV brown card
Edition of 100
42 x 70cm

name: Charon's Obol (The Great Waves) Art Print
description: Three colour screen print (Black, White, Metallic Blue 280 GSM Carin Eco card stock 450mm x 640mm Edition of 77 2013 In Greek mythology, Charon or Kharon (/ˈkɛərɒn/ or /ˈkɛərən/; Greek Χάρων) is the ferryman of Hades who carries souls of the newly deceased across the rivers Styx and Acheron that divided the world of the living from the world of the dead. The obol (ancient Greek: ὀβολός obolos, literally "spit, iron rod" plural: ὀβολοί oboloí; hence also obolus, obolos) was an ancient silver coin. In Classical Athens, there were six obols to the drachma "Last boat, stand in a river; Muddy river, oh how I love her" -Chan Marshall

name: Sacrifice # 1 & 2 Greetings cards pack
description:
Pack of two greetings cards Illustrated by myself and designed and printed by Baseline/Handcooked Posters

  • Limited edition of thirty pieces each
  • Screen printed by hand, including logo decal on envelopes
  • Machine numbered on reverse.
  • Interior left blank so you can include whatever commiserations you can think may be appropriate when giving someone a card with a dead bird on it.

Blog post with process photos and more information here:  http://michaelcowell.tumblr.com/post/31289615521/mr-douglas-walker-of-hand-cooked-posters

name: The Mercer House art print

name: Sports- Black Note Saga: 001.101706 [LTD cassette, Deathsmile records] RARE Noise/Drone
description:
The very rare Sports cassette release on Deathsmile records, limited to 100 hand numbered copies in deluxe cases. 

"This is the first existing documentation of SPORTS Bronekvlt's ongoing [sic] live experiments in attempts to achieve the Black Note.  The existence of this disc is proof of our failure.  Experiments must continue."

Between 2009 and 2011 I did some work producing layouts for the underground label experimental/black metal/doom cassette label Deathsmile Records. All releases on the label are now SOLD OUT world wide. I have a few copies here due to unearthing a box that the label had sent me while I was moving house.


Tracklist

1  The Grimmisphere 	25:13 	


Credits

Sports is - 3 Demons
Artwork By [Art & Design] – Johnny Miller
Engineer – David Dobbs
Layout for cassette - Michael Cowell

name: Pallbearer - 2010 Demo [LTD cassette, Deathsmile records] RARE Doom/Metal
description:
The highly sought after Pallbearer 2010 Demo cassette release on Deathsmile records, limited to 100 hand numbered copies in delux cases. Please note:  This is the second pressing with transparent purple cassette body.

Between 2009 and 2011 I did some work producing layouts for the underground label experimental/black metal/doom cassette label Deathsmile Records. All releases on the label are now SOLD OUT world wide. I have a few copies here due to unearthing a box that the label had sent me while I was moving house.


Track listing

A1 		The Legend 		
A2 		Devoid Of Redemption 		
A3 		Gloomy Sunday 		
B1 		The Legend 		
B2 		Devoid Of Redemption 		
B3 		Gloomy Sunday 		

Repeats both sides


Credits

Engineer [Additional Assistance] – David Dobbs
At This Time Pallbearer Was – Brett Campbell, Devin Holt, Joseph D. Rowland, Zach Stine
Recorded By, Mixed By, Mastered By – Pallbearer
Layout for Cassette- Michael Cowell

name: Wold- LOTMP [LTD cassette, Deathsmile records] PROFOUND LORE Black Metal/Noise
description:
The Wold LOTMP cassette release on Deathsmile records, limited to 100 hand numbered copies in deluxe cases.  Original CD release via Profound Lore, 2004


Between 2009 and 2011 I did some work producing layouts for the underground label experimental/black metal/doom cassette label Deathsmile Records.  All releases on the label are now SOLD OUT world wide.  I have a few copies here due to unearthing a box that the label had sent me while I was moving house.

name: BAD ACID DVD MAGAZINE: The Final Burnout Issue *LAST AVAILABLE COPY*
description:
I've been working on doing layouts for these guys for a few years and produced one of the alternate covers for this final issue (What would have been Tab 12).  Bad Acid has possibly the most content I've ever come across in a periodical of any sort.  With 160 screen PDF magazine, 300+ band/40+ hour mp3 audio compilation, 4 hour DVD 180 minutes of bonus mp4 and video footage, label profiles and samplers, this'll take about five years to get through.  Here's a full contents list:

*DVD/MP4 DISC*
(4 hrs of DVD plus 100 mins of bonus mp4)

Promo Videos:

Estel - Septic Rabbits In The Basement
Chaoticum - The Dharma Of Maitreya
Forcefeel - 58008
Loan - Express Halaiketa
Hot Bone - Flightless Bird
Hombre - Promo video

Medes - Skulls

Live Footage

Short Films & TV

Neurosis - Interview with Steve Von Til
Tekknorg with Ghoul Detail - First Contact


*PDF MAGAZINE/LABEL SAMPLER/ BUMUS MP4 DISC*

160 screen colour pdf magazine

Reviews of most of the featured bands from the audio disc.
